vallibrary.measures
Class Measure

java.lang.Object
  vallibrary.measures.Measure
Direct Known Subclasses:
AdjustedRand, Clest, ConsensusClustering, FigureOfMerit, FIndex, FMIndex, GapStatistics, KrzanowskiLai, NullMeasure, Silhouette, WithinClustersSumSquares
public abstract class Measure
extends java.lang.Object

The Measure class is the base class for all measures. A Measure Object encapsulates all the informations needed for a measure. These informations include:

  • A field MEASURE_NAME containing the name of the measure
  • An input Data Matrix
  • A measure vector containing measure values
  • A data header containing data collected in experiment

Version:
1.0
Author:
Raffaele Giancarlo, Davide Scaturro, Filippo Utro

executeAlgorithm

public int executeAlgorithm(java.lang.String cmnd,
                            java.lang.String outputPath)
                     throws java.lang.IllegalThreadStateException
Executes external clustering Algorithm

Parameters:
cmnd - the command line for algorithm execution
outputPath - the output path used from the external algorithm
Returns:
an integer representing exit code, equals to 0 if algorithm terminates without error, equals to 1 if algorithm terminates with error or an Exception occurs
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalThreadStateException

composeCmndLine

public java.lang.String composeCmndLine(int k,
                                        java.lang.String algPath,
                                        java.lang.String inputPath,
                                        java.lang.String outputPath,
                                        java.lang.String initPath,
                                        int nsteps,
                                        java.lang.String commandLine,
                                        boolean initFlag)
Interprets the command line tags and composes the correct command line for extern algorithm execution. Tags include:
  • "<"inputfile">" represents input file path name
  • "<"outputfile">" represents output file path name
  • "<"nofcluster">" represents number of clusters
  • "<"extinit">" represents path name of external init file
  • "<"nsteps">" represents a parameter for convergence

      Parameters:
      k - number of clusters required in command line
      algPath - path of the external algorithm
      inputPath - path of data matrix input file
      outputPath - path of clustering solution
      initPath - path of external initializzation file
      nsteps - number of steps for algorithm convergence
      commandLine - the command line to interpret
      initFlag - flag for external initialization
      Returns:
      the command line interpreted

getProcess

public static java.lang.Process getProcess()
Object process acessor method

a reference to the process object
